data.title: 30 years ago, Toni Morrison won the Nobel Prize in Literature
data.meta_description: A new exhibition at Princeton University displays of the author's correspondence and early drafts of her novels.
data.text:
A new exhibition at Princeton University celebrates the 30th anniversary of Toni Morrison's Nobel Prize in Literature, with displays of the author's correspondence and early drafts of her novels.

NPR's Neda Ulaby paid a visit.

This segment aired on May 1, 2023.
